reviews.text: This is a relatively new hotel that overlooks the Bishop's Castle. The rooms are spacious and our's had a balcony. The bathrooms were nice. The lobby bar services an area where you can drink on the patio or inside beside the fireplace. The fireplace area is outfitted with great reclining "sofa" type chairs. The hotel's restaurant serves the included breakfast in the morning and has a great decor. The food is excellent as is the wine selection. The breakfast buffet has a wide variety. The hotel has ample free parking, has a small grocery store nearby and is a 5-10 minute walk from the castle and downtown. The only downside, which cannot really be attributed to the hotel, is that it sits beside a small inlet and the mosquitos there eat you alive. Bring repellent if you plan to hang outside after dusk. Lastly, the women in our party raved about the spa services. These services were quite cheap when compared to US prices.
reviews.title: Fabulous Hotel, but mind the mosquitos

reviews.text: Georg Ots Hotel is situated overlooking the Tori Yacht harbour and the medieval Bishop’s Fort. It’s approx 5 min drive into the village. The village of Kuressaare is tiny but there are some attractive historic buildings, cafes and restaurants to visit. The main attraction is the medieval castle and the parkland and paths surrounding it.
reviews.title: The best of the island - A Spa surprise .
We will return
reviews.text: Check in – We booked this room over the internet with a great rate, through www.booking.com and absolutely had no problem with check-in.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room – Our room 404 was on the smallish size and consisted on a double bed, bedside tables, mini bar, small working desk and a balcony. The carpet was unusual and distinctive with big bold colourful stripes which one could absolutely loathe or adore.
reviews.title: Good room, great spa, fantastic restaurant
Great room!
reviews.text: Bathroom – On the small size but was extremely well designed, with a separate walk-in shower and toilet. A good make-up mirror and vanity suite. Dressing gown was also supplied.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 'Spa Hotel' conjurs up images of chic luxury and the kind of place celebs go to dry out after being caught on a drunken night out by the tabloids - this the not the Georg Ots.
reviews.title: Perfect for a couple of days r&r
